title: #119: Discussing Crime Scene Staging with Laura Pettler
description:
Recorded at CrimeCon 2017, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti sat down with Dr. Laura Pettler, a forensic criminologist, to discuss her methods of crime scene staging and her renaissance woman life.



New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrimw
